channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Curtain
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Curtain

item.title: CVE-2022-1558|2024-08-03T00:10:02.951Z -- unknown -- curtain
item.description: The Curtain WordPress plugin through 1.0.2 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed
